mthong bas sa brgyad las yongs su 'da' ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang /
'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/ sa bstan pa brgyad po 'di dag las shes pa dang mthong ba las 'das nas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bag chags kyi mtshams
sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo / /rab 'byor/ de la brgyad pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes
dang | spong ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes dang / spong ba gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes dang spong ba gang yin pa de'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/ dgra bcom pa'i ye shes
dang spong ba gang yin pa de'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / spong ba gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i bzod pa chen po ste/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par
byas shing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyis/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo / /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam thams cad
yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar
'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po drug cu gsum pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang nyan thos kyi shul
dang | rang sangs rgyas kyi shul dang / sangs rgyas kyi shul de dag las/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi shul gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya ste/ de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ni rnam pa gang dang
gang | tshul gang dang gang / mtshan ma gang dang gang gis lam du brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang / tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ci nas kyang gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur pa dang / gzhan 'dul ba'i don du gzhan la brjod pa dang / bstan
pa dang / bshad pa dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par dgod pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra brnyan lta bur shes par bya ba'i don du/ sgra skad dang brdar bya ba
gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra skad dang brda thams cad brjod par bya/ yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /lam thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi
bsam pa rig par bya ste/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba pa'i lam shes par bya'o/ /rgyu shes par bya'o/ /'bras bu shes par bya'o/ /des kyang sems
can dmyal ba'i lam bzlog par bya ste/ rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/ /'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam
shes par bya'o/ /rgyu shes par bya'o/ /'bras bu shes par bya'o/ /des kyang byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam bzlog par bya ste/ rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/ /'bras
bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lam shes par bya'o/ /rgyu shes par bya'o/ /'bras bu shes par bya'o/ /des
kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam las kyang bzlog par bya'o/ /rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/ /'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu dang /
gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / lha dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o/ /rgyu shes par bya'o/ /'bras bu shes par bya'o/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
dang | 'bras bu che ba'i rnams dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom
snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o/ /rgyu shes par bya'o/ /'bras bu shes par bya'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang /
rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o/ /
rgyu shes par bya'o/ /'bras bu shes par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi shes par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
dang | bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug
pa dgu shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams
pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po shes par bya'o/ /lam de dag gis kyang sems can gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
'god/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god/ gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god/ gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god/ gang rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ rang byang chub
la 'god/ gang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ byang chub la 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /de dag la bslabs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug go /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la
zhugs nas de bzhin du chos ston to/ /des chos bstan pa de'ang 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des gzhan gyi dbang po shin tu shes par byas
pa'i phyir te/ de ni sems can rnams kyi lam dang / lam ma yin pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs gang la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
bslab par bya ba'am/ nyan thos kyis bslab par bya ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis bslab par bya ba'i chos thams cad gang yang ma 'dus pa med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te
de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang lags pa dang / byang chub gang lags pa'i chos de dag thams cad ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/ gzugs ma mchis pa/
bstan du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig na/ ji ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams byang chub sgrub par 'gyur ba lags/
bcom ldan 'das/ ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags la/ gzugs ma mchis shing / bstan du ma mchis/ thogs pa ma mchis/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par/
mtshan nyid gcig pa ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa'am/ 'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa'am 'jig par mi
bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni/ chos gang la'ang sgrub pa'am/ 'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa'am/ 'jig par byed pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ sems can gang rang gi mtshan
nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag gi don du 'di skad du/ 'di dag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos byang chub thob par byed pa'o zhes bshad kyi/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs gang
yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan
bzhi pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi
snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes
med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni chos dang 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa bstan du med
pa thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig kyang / de dag de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams gzung bar bya ba'i don du 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis
de skad du brjod de/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang / mthong bas bslab par bya ste/ ji lta ba bzhin
du shes pa dang / mthong bas bslabs nas/ chos la la ni mngon du bya'o/ /la la ni mngon du mi bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang ni shes pa dang /
mthong bas bslabs te mngon du bya'o/ chos gang ni mngon du mi bya zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs te mngon du mi bya'o/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon du bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen pos 'phags pa'i chos dang / 'dul ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba/ 'phags
pa'i chos dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba de ji tsam gyis na/ 'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la nyan thos rnams
dang | rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
ni| 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/
'jig tshogs su lta ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ the tshom dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs snyems pa dang
ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod
chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ ma rig pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ nga rgyal dang / rgod pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ bsam
gtan dang po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ bsam gtan gsum pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/
bral ba'ang ma yin/ bsam gtan bzhi pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ byams pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ snying rje dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral
ba'ang ma yin/ dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par
'jug pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
dang | bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ldan
ba'ang ma yin/ bral pa'ang ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin
pas| de'i phyir de dag ni 'phags pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni de dag gi chos dang 'dul ba yin pas/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
ltar chos de dag thams cad gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ de dag ni gzugs med pa dang /
gzugs med par ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /bstan du med pa dang / bstan du med par ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /thogs pa med pa dang /
thogs pa med par ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid med par ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o/ /des de la bslabs na/ chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na gzugs
kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ skye mched dang / khams dang /
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi
'am| nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan
nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi
bgyi'am/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi
'am| nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms
par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skya mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la
bslab par mi bgyi'am/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mthar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi
'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par
mi bgyi'am/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa
dang | lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab
par mi bgyi'am/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos
'di dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid
la bslabs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par
'jug par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs na/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/
ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor na/ ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen
pos sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te chos la la zhig la mtshan nyid yod na ni/ de'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de la bslab par yang 'gyur na/ chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med cing / gzugs med/ bstan du med/ thogs pa med pa
ste| 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya/ mtshan nyid med pa
la'ang bslab par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad mtshan nyid med par gyur pa'am/ phyis mtshan nyid yod par gyur ba ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor/ chos 'di dag ni sngon chad kyang
mtshan nyid med la/ da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya/ mtshan nyid med pa
la'ang bslab par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings
'di ni de bzhin du gnas pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid ma mchis shing / mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags/ mtshan nyid gcig
pa'ang ma lags na/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar mi nus so/ /nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus so/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par ni
mngon par shes pa bsgrub par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs par ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sems can yongs su
smin par bgyi bar mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi nus so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar ni sems can rnams rgyun
du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par mi nus so/ /rang byang
chub la dgod par mi nus so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par mi nus so/ /sems can rnams sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos
po la dgod par mi nus so/ /tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi pa'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin/ mtshan
nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ de ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin
te| rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /gsol pa/ de ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa
bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs rnam
par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnam par bsgom pa
bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /
sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /mig gi
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam
par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /chu'i khams
dang | me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /

'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rnam par bsgom pa
bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam
gtan bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /snying rje dang / dga'
ba dang / btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes
med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam
par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes
su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par
bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /sdug bsngal
gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang / srog
gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du
shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa bsgom pa'o/ /rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes
rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /yang dag
par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing
dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa rnam par bsgom
pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes
pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /
nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par bsgom pa
bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad
rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par
bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam
par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched
dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na blang ba dang / dor ba rnam par bsgom pa
bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan
bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye
mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par
bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul

khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /
lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag
med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du
shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor
ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du
shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byang
chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge
'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa
'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang /
mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dngos po
yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /blang ba dang / dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum
pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha'
yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod
ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /

gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa
dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po
med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes
dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /
mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod
ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /rtog pa dang bcas dpyod ba dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa
med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba
'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang /
lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa
dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / bag chags kyi mtshams
sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
pa med do/ /dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do/ /dngos po'i 'du shes can la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i bar du med do/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dngos po la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags te/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan
dang / shes rab dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i bar la/ 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pas/ gang
mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur ba de la ni thar pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la ni/ sbyin pa'ang med/ tshul khrims kyang med/ bzod
pa'ang med/ brtson 'grus kyang med/ bsam gtan yang med/ shes rab kyang med/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i bar du'ang yongs su shes pa med na/
de thar par 'gyur ba lta ga las yod/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gnyis ni dngos po yod pa'o/ /mi gnyis pa ni dngos po med pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /skye mched
dang | khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so /blang ba dang / dor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam
gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par
'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa

dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran
pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du
shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi
'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du
shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs
kyi chos rnams kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med
pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / lam 'phags
pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes
su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi 'du shes
ni gnyis so/ /mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig
phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams
kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar de snyed du 'du shes dang bcas pa thams cad dang / de snyed du 'du shes med pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis
te| ji tsam du gnyis pa de tsam du dngos po'o/ /ji tsam du dngos po yod pa de tsam du 'khor ba'o/ /ji tsam du 'khor bde tsam du sems can rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol lo/ /'du shes thams cad yid la mi byed pa ni
gnyis su med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar gnyis kyi 'du shes can la sbyin pa med pa dang / tshul khrims med pa dang / bzod pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus
med pa dang / bsam gtan med pa dang / shes rab med pa dang / lam med pa dang / thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gnyis kyi 'du
shes can la ni chung ngu na mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang med na/ gzugs yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs
su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ blang ba dang / dor ba yongs su shes
par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga'
pa dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched
kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes

su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su
dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag
med pa'i 'du shes dang / mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang / srog gi 'du shes dang / skye ba'i 'du
shes dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang / shed can gyi 'du shes dang / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /
tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /
bde ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug pa'i 'du shes dang / bdag gi 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur
ba lta ga la yod/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs
su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa
med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa 'phags pa'i
bden pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi
skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la
yod| pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /
byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gang la lam bsgom pa med pa de la
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang ga la yod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ga la yod/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa lta'ang ga la yod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa
las| le'u lnga bcu brgyad pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar
dngos po'i 'du shes can la/ mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang ma mchis pas/ thob pa lta ga la mchis te ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa lta'ang ga la mchis te ma
mchis na ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'du shes can la/ mthun pa'i bzod pa'am/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa'am/ rigs kyi sa'am/ brgyad
pa'i sa'am/ mthong ba'i sa'am/ bsrabs pa'i sa'am/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa'am/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'am/
sangs rgyas kyi sa'am/ lam bsgom pa gang la brten cing / nyon mongs pa gang gis bsgribs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par chud par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang
chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas/ bag chags kyi
mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi spongs pa'i sgrib pa/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam
mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang skye ba ma mchis na/ ji ltar chos de dag ma bskyed par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes can la mthun pa'i bzod pa med do/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i sa
med do/ /dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa med do/ /rigs kyi sa med do/ /brgyad pa'i sa med do/ /mthong ba'i sa med do/ /bsrabs pa'i sa med do/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med do/ /
byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa med do/ /lam bsgom pa gang la brten cing nyon mongs pa gang gis
bsgribs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur
ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi spongs pa'i sgrib pa/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs
rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po mchis par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po ma mchis par 'du shes pa mchis sam/ gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / skye mched dang / khams su 'du shes pa dang / 'dod chags su 'du shes pa dang / 'dod
chags spang bar 'du shes pa dang / zhe sdang du 'du shes pa dang / zhe sdang spang bar 'du shes pa dang / gti mug tu 'du shes pa dang / gti mug spang bar 'du shes pa dang / ma rig
par 'du shes pa dang / ma rig pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed du 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed spang bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par
shes pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs spang bar 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug tu 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug spang bar
'du shes pa dang / reg par 'du shes pa dang / reg pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / sred par 'du shes pa dang / sred
pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / len par 'du shes pa dang / len pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / srid par 'du shes pa dang / srid pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / skye bar 'du shes pa
dang / skye ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / rga shir 'du shes pa dang / rga shi spang bar 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don par 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don
pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal du 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal kun shes par bya bar 'du shes pa dang / kun 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang / kun 'byung bar spong bar 'du shes pa dang /
'gog par 'du shes pa dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya bar 'du shes pa dang / lam du 'du shes pa dang / lam bsgom par 'du shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes
pa'am/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'du shes pa'i bar du mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni med do/ /rab
'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang la'ang dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/ dngos po med par 'du shes
pa med do/ /gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i bzod pa'o/ /gang la
dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni lam bsgom pa'o/ /gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de
nyid ni 'bras bu'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po med pa ste/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang dngos po med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar rnam grangs
des kyang / 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar chos thams cad
dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas par gyur te/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba'i yul la mnga' brnyes par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i
tshe| 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan
dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bar la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang ngas bsam gtan de dag dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag
de dag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/ bsam gtan de dag gis snyems par ma gyur/ bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar ma gyur/ bsam gtan du dmigs par ma gyur te/ de ltar na ngas
bsam gtan de dag rnam pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par bzhag go /de ltar ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam par smin par byas nas/ lha'i mig shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon du bya ba'i
phyir| sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gzhol bar bya/ pha rol gyi sems shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gzhol bar bya/ sngon gyi gnas
rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i mig gi shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gzhol bar bya/ 'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du bya
ba de dag la mtshan mar bzung ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur/ ro myong bar ma gyur/ dmigs par ma gyur te/ mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag nam mkha' lta
bur yang dag par rjes su dran pas mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lo/ /'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag
pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par gyur te/ de ltar de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur
to| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par gyur/ sems can rnams kyang sems can ma mchis par
ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te 'dod pa rnams dang / sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po
zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid yod pa'am/ gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
nyid dang / sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par yang mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar
'dod pa rnams dang / sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po med pa/ ngo bo nyid med pa/ gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ rab 'byor/
de'i phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes
pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/ /rab 'byor/ gal te
mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po zhig yod de ngo bo nyid yod pa'am/ gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor/ ngas kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du
rig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po med de/ ngo bo
nyid med pa/ gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rab
'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid
la| bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du chos
thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis slob pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi ba gang
gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis slob pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bgyi
ba mchis par gyur// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po drug cu bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di
ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / sangs rgyas mang po
la bsnyen bkur ba'i dgra bcom pa dag dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dag las/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po
med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dngos po med pa'i

ngo bo nyid dang / 'phags pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid chung ngu na/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis gnas tsam yang med do zhes bya bar thos na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ci ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung / gal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa nyid yin gyi/ ci nas kyang
bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/ sems can dngos po'i 'du shes can la spyod pa thams cad dngos po med pa la rab tu
dgod par bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/ mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba gang la bslabs shing / sngon gyi byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa

dang | mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba rtsom mo/ /de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do/ /de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag
kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu 'jog go /sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/ /sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi'ang legs pa
brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de sbyin pa des skyid pa chen po'i tshogs thob par gyur te/ skyon dang ser sna med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa yongs
su gtong bar byed de/ zas 'dod pa la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa la ni gos/ spos 'dod pa la ni spos/ phreng ba 'dod pa la ni phreng
ba| byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa la ni mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/ mar me 'dod pa la ni mar me gtong ba nas/ mi'i yod byad gang ci'ang rung ba dag kyang
de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lha'i che ba nyid dang / mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang /

tshul khrims de nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa

dang | tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
rnam par grol ba de nyid kyis/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol
ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i
skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god
cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad
kyang dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa
nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do/ /gzhan tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de tshul khrims des lha'i che ba
nyid dang / mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/ /de nor med pa'i sems can rnams la nor byin zhing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol
ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung
po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab
kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i
skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams thag pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol
bar byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs
pa brjod do/ /gzhan bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/ /tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol
ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par
grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po
dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol
bar byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams
la brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul lo/ /brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do/ /gzhan brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing
mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/ /tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge
'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab
kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub
sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas
nas| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams
theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyis mthar gyis
spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la gzhog go/ gzhan
yang tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god do/ /tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod do/ /gzhan tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas shing / sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim
par byed do/ /tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /de tshul khrims kyi
phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs
su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems
can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su
tshim par byed do/ /tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgrub bo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog
go /shes rab sgom mo/ /gzhan yang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la rab tu gzhog go /sbyin pa dang / tshul
khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi legs pa brjod do/ /gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang /
bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab sgom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / thabs mkhas pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed
do| |rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mthar gyis spyod pa rtsom ste/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa la slob ste/
de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs
par byed de/ de sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ /chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes
su dran pa bsgom mo/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs su yid la mi byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
shes par yid la mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do/ /gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
dang / rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do/ /gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa
med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la mi byed/ sku gser gyi kha dog gis yid la mi byed/ 'od 'dom gang
bas yid la mi byed/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yid la mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po
med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la mi byed/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung
po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung por yid la mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la
ngo bo nyid med do/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/
sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid la mi byed/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yid la mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid
med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /
rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar yid la mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo po nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med
pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar na mthar
gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ de mthar gyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar gyis slob pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la
slob pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan
dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /stong
pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/ dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na/ dran pa'i las
rdul tsam yang yod pa'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/
rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de chos rjes su dran pa sgom na/ dge ba'i chos yid la mi byed/
mi dge ba'i chos yid la mi byed/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos dang / zang zing med pa'i chos dang / 'phags
pa'i chos dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang / zag pa med pa'i chos dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos dang / gzugs kyi
khams su gtogs pa'i chos dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos yid la mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
de ni 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa de la bslabs shing / dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes pa'ang med na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta
ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
