kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ chu de gang nas 'ong / shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'am/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi rgya mtshor 'gro'am/ gang du 'gro /rtag
par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ smig rgyu ba la chu yod pa ma yin na/ de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba lta ga la yod/ rigs kyi bu/ dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa'i mi de ni smig rgyu ba chu
med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pas byis pa'i rigs/ shes rab rtul po'i rigs te/ de na chu'i ngo bo ni yod pa ma yin no/ /chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu /de
de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du gang su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen nas/ de dag de bzhin
gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rigs/ shes rab rtul po'i rigs so zhes brjod par bya ste/ dper na/ mi zhig chu med pa la chur 'du
shes bskyed pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos nyid la ni 'gro pa'am 'ong ba med de/
rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs
sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ rkang thang gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs
kyi bu/ dper na/ mi zhig gi rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga
bcu'am/ brgya'am/ stong ngam/ brgya phrag stong ngam/ de bas kyang mang ba mthong nas sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud/ rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rmi lam gyi chos ni gang yang yongs su grub
pa med de/ rmi lam ni brdzun pa ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ /chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes de bzhin
gshegs pas gsungs te/ rigs kyi bu gang su'ang rung / chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa legs par mi shes pa de dag ni de
bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi tshogs sam/ gzugs kyi tshogs su mngon par zhen pas/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud
par rtog ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa'am/ bzhud par 'dod pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skye bo
ste| de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar dong / 'dong / 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thag ring / de dag thams
cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang thag ring ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes bshad pa legs par shes pa de dag
ni| chos gang yang 'ong ba'am 'gro bar mi rtog go /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye
bar gyur to/ /de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob ma ste/ grong khyer gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za'o/ /de dag 'jig rten
pa'i sbyin gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che rnams ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
dang / mtshams rnams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus rgya mtsho chen por rin po che rnams
'byung ste/ de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen rnams la rag lus pa/ rten cing 'brel pa las 'byung ngo / /rin po che de dag med par 'gyur ba na'ang phyogs bcu gang
du'ang mi 'pho ste dong pa med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las/ rin po che de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen rnams med par gyur pa las rin po che de rnams med par 'gyur
ro| |rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang mi bzhud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das kyi sku de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin gyi/ sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la rag lus pa/ rgyu las kun tu byung ba/ sngon gyi las kyi
rnam par smin pa'i sems can gyi dmigs pa dang ldan pa las snang ste/ phyogs bcu gang na'ang yod pa ni ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las sku yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen de rnams med pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pi wang gi sgra 'byung ba'i tshe/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag
pa'i tshe gang du'ang mi 'gro /gang du'ang 'pho ba med la/ rten cing yang 'byung pa rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ pi wang gi
khog pa dang / pags pa dang / yu ba dang / rgyud dang / blang ba dang / sbreng shing dang / mi'i rtsol pa la brten nas pi wang gi sgra 'byung ste/ sgra de'ang khog pa las kyang ma byung /
pags pa dang / yu ba dang / rgyud rnams dang / sbreng shing las kyang ma byung / blang ba dang / mi'i rtsol ba las kyang ma byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad 'dus shing ldan pa
las sgra 'byung ngo / /'gag pa na'ang sgra de gang du'ang mi 'gro /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa'ang / rgyu dang rkyen la rag
lus pa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /rgyu gcig las ma byung / rkyen gcig las ma byung / dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig las sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba ma yin no/ /
rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin te/ rgyu dang rkyen du ma tshogs pa las byung ba de gang nas kyang ma byon/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med na'ang gang du'ang mi bzhud do/ /rigs kyi
bu| de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin du rig
par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par rab tu shes na/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa la'ang nges par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa
med pa ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu
g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang 'khrugs/ nyams par gyur to/ /stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rtsi shing dang / sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
kyis 'phags pa gang na ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/ /dus ma yin pa'i me tog rnams kyang byung bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bab
par gyur/ rnga'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang steng gi bar snang las grag par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dang / phye ma gzhan dag gis kyang
gtor/ mngon par gtor/ rab tu mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yon tan gyis deng bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / don dam pa
las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba/ 'jig tshogs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma yin pa bshad pa thos
so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad smras so/ /
sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin/ rkyen gang yin/ chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa med pa dang /
bzhud pa med pa bshad pa 'di khyod kyis dris/ ngas bshad pa na/ srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur/ srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad
cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ srog chags stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni rngul med cing dri ma med par gyur nas/ chos la chos kyi
mig rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/
bdag gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa'i chos bshad pa 'di yongs su dris pa las/ sems can 'di
snyed cig gi don byas pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni de nyid kyis
chog go /de phyin chad ni bdag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu the tshom mi 'byung / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba la dogs pa med do snyam nas de dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid dang ldan pas/ shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags
nas/ shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la gnas te/ 'di snyam du bdag 'di ltar bar snang la 'dug pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags
pa la cis mchod snyam du bsams pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba nam mkha' la 'phags pa
mthong nas de sems la yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes te/ lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dag de la byin nas 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod me
tog 'di dag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa byos shig /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng sems can stong
phrag mang po rnams kyi don byas par gyur pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod la nged kyis phan gdags so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar spro bar byas pa de lta bur/ gang sems
can thams cad kyi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de lta bu dag rab tu dkon no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog mnad ra ba dag blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la bdag gi lus kyis kyang bkab nas tshig 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod la deng phan chad g.yog bya ba'i
phyir bdag gi lus kyang 'bul lo zhes nas/ de bar snang las babs te bdag phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar
te 'dug go /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/
khyod la bdag cag kyang 'di ltar lus 'bul lo/ /bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag nyid thob par gyur cig /phyin chad kyang khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byed par gyur cig /khyod dang lhan cig tu gnas par gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab
tu ngu bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad smras so/ /bu mo khyod snying nas nga'i bsam pa dang mthun par byed cing / snying nas nga la lus 'bul na ni
nga'ang khyed len to/ /bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag khyod la snying nas bsam pa dang mthun par byed cing / khyod ci dgos pa bya ba'i phyir snying nas lus 'bul lo/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya rnams rgyan thams cad kyis klubs/ shing rta lnga brgya
po de rnams kyang rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la phul te/ rigs kyi bu khyod la bu mo 'di rnams
dang / shing rta lnga brgya po 'di rnams yongs su spyad par bya ba'i phyir dbul lo zhes smras so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu
de la rigs kyi bu legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes nas/ legs pa byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de ltar bdog pa thams cad
yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /gtong ba'i sems de lta bu dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos smra ba la de ltar mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa nyan nus par 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gtong ba de lta bu la gnas nas/ bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu bsgrubs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa'ang yongs su dris so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon
gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams dang shing rta lnga brgya blangs so/ /blangs nas kyang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rigs kyi bu de nyid la slar byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa stan las langs nas bdag gi khyim du song ngo / /nyi ma'ang nub par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa'am/ nyal ba ni legs pa ma yin la/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa bdag gi khyim nas chos 'chad pa'i phyir ma byung gi bar du 'greng ba'am/ 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis bsdad
do snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun du snyoms par zhugs pa gcig la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting
nge 'dzin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa las byung ba stong phrag grangs med tshad med pa las gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'ang lo bdun du 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi bskyed/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / ro la chags pa ni
bskyed kyi/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi bu de gang la 'dug nas chos
'chad pa'i chos kyi stan gding bar bya na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di langs pa ji tsam na mthong snyam pa dang / sa phyogs
gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa 'chad pa'i sa phyogs de'ang phyag dar
byas shing chag chag gis btab la/ me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu gtor to snyam pa las bsam pa gzhan med do/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de
rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis po de nyid kyis sdod cing 'khod do/ /bya ba thams cad
kyang de dang rjes su mthun par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ste/ langs nas kyang
grong khyer gyi dbus su chos 'chad do zhes zer ba'i sgra nam mkha' las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas thos so/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu bas sgra de thos nas/ dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo
lnga brgya po rnams dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de byi dor byas nas/ chos kyi stan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'ang bting ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po thams
cad kyis bdag cag gi bla gos lus las phud de stan gang la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'dug ste/ chod 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan der bla gos
lnga brgya stan du bting ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/ sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i phyir kho ra khor yug tu chu btsal na/ sa
phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i chu bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba chu ma rnyed nas/ sems la sdug bsngal ba dang /
yid mi dga' ba dang / sems gzhan du gyur te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med par gyur cing / mchod pa de'ang ngan par 'gyur ba de lta bur bya ba'i phyir/ chu de med pa byas pas chu ma rnyed
par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /'o na bdag gi lus phug ste/ sa phyogs 'di khrag gis chag chag gdab
bo| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i lus la ma
rung bar gyur na bdag gi lus nges par 'jig par 'gyur ba 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus don med par chud zos pa bas 'di ltar byas na bdag gi lus med par gyur kyang bla'o/ /
bdag gi lus stong phrag du ma 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i mtshan mar 'khor ba na yang dang yang du 'khor ba'i tshe chud zos kyi/ gnas 'di lta bu dag tu
ni ma song ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te bdag gi lus kun phug nas/ sa phyogs de kun bdag gi
khrag gis chag chag btab bo/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob
pas/ thams cad kyis mtshon rnon po blangs nas/ bdag cag gi lus phug ste/ sa phyogs de bdag cag gi khrag gis chag chag btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang / bu mo de rnams kyang sems gzhan du ma gyur te/ bdud sdig to can gyis dge ba'i phyogs la bar chad bya ba'i skabs rnyed par yang
ma gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di de ltar chos 'dod pa dang / de ltar yi dam
la brtan pa dang / go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas 'di ltar sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las yongs su thar bar bya bar sems pa
de ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs so/ /sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug kyang lha'i tsan+dan gyi chu'i dri bsam gyis
mi khyab pa dpag tshad brgya'i bar du bsung bar byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras
so| |rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / khyod chos 'dod pa dang / chos 'tshol ba bla na med pa de legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon gyi de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / brtson 'grus de lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa de lta bus
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrubs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du
gyur to/ /bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i chos kyi stan ni bting zin/ sa phyogs 'di'ang chag chag btab cing phyag
dar byas zin na/ sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog gis gtor ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos 'chad pa la gtor
ba'i me tog bdag gis ga las rnyed snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras
so| |rigs kyi bu/ lha'i me tog mnad ra ba 'di rnams khyer la/ 'di dag gis sa phyogs 'di khyod kyis me tog gis gtor cig /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan la 'dug cing / chos 'chad pa la'ang gtor cig ces nas/ des lha'i me tog mnad ra ba khal bzhi brgya de la byin no/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas me tog de dag blangs nas/ me tog kha cig ni sa phyogs der gtor/ me tog kha cig ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun lon
pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ chos kyi stan gang na 'dug pa der song nas/ stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor/ mdun du byas nas
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog gi mchod pa byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa mthong nas/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa yid la byed pa rtse gcig tu gyur
pa de lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa ni/ 'di lta ste/
chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par dben pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dben no/ /
chos thams cad mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi g.yo ba nyid do/ /chos thams cad sems pa med pa'i phyir /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sems pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mnan pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnan pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams
cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa
nyid do/ /chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /ri rab lta bur rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' ltar rnam par mi
rtog pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa nyid do/ /gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /de
bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /sa'i khams mtha'
yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /rdo rje lta bur chos thams cad mnyam
pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa med pa nyid do/ /
chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin du 'dug pa las/
de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nges par byung ngo / /chos thams cad
rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad sems pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dang / chos thams cad mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
chos thams cad spyod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa
na rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag drug brgya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas rab tu thob par gyur to/ /shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ chos kyis 'phags pa'i le'u ste/ bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
dang / mtshams rnams dang / bla 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang
chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du byas pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / tshig
'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad pa mthong ba ni/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nga byang
chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du byas shing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / tshig 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di
dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad cing 'dug pa lta bu'o/ /de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pas/ thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur
to| |tshe rabs thams cad du'ang nam yang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to/ /tshe rabs thams cad du gang dang gang du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yod pa'i 'jig rten
gyi khams de dang der skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon sum du chos nyan to/ /chung ngu na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba
dang / chos nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral lo/ /de mi khom pa thams cad spangs shing dal 'byor dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'o/ /de bas na/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
pa| kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhig /chongs shig /lhogs
shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan la'ang rgyas bar ston cig /kun dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyis kyang mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ bsgrag par bya/ bstan par bya/ bshad par bya/ kha ton du bya/ rab tu bsgom
par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis chung du na/ glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal bar bris te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng pa dang /
byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu'ang mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa du mas
mchod cing / rim gror bya/ bla mar bya/ bsti stang du bya/ mchod par bya/ brjed par bya/ gus par bya ste/ 'di ni ngas rjes su gtams pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'
bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rag lus ba'i phyir ro/ /
kun dga' bo/ de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bde
bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun
dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin te/ khyod kyis yongs su spyad do/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis byams pa'i lus kyi las yid du 'ong zhing / yid du mi 'ong
ba ma yin pa dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las yid du 'ong zhing / yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las yid du 'ong zhing / yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pas yongs
su spyad do/ /de bas na kun dga' bo/ nga da ltar lus 'di la gnas shing 'tsho skyong ba na/ gang khyod kyis byams pa dang / dga' ba dang / bla mar byas pa de/ nga 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod
kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gyis shig /kun dga' bo/ khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du gtad cing rjes su gtad kyi/ khyod kyis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di med par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig /kun dga' bo/ ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bzhugs par rig par
bya| de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgrog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / rim gror byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / bsti stang du byed pa dang /
mchod par byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / gus par byed cing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang /
rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pas mchod par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/
chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring bar 'khod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das thugs dgyes pas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal chen po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa
'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa re ba ta dang / tshe dang
ldan pa rA hu la dang / 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur
to| |shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
pa/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas rnams kyi yum rdzogs so// //mang+ga laM/ //
